name: BMASliders
summary: Configurable range and simple sliders, IBInspectable and IBDesignable compatible
description: BMASliders` is a set of reusable sliders. It includes two kind of sliders, one with customizable ranges -`BMARangeSlider`- and a simpler one -`BMASlider`- along with its labeled counterparts -`BMALabeledRangeSlider` and `BMALabeledSlider`
